About Me

I am an MBA candidate at University Canada West with a Bachelor of Commerce from Gujarat University. My professional background includes administrative and managerial roles in the education sector, where I developed strong organizational, communication, and leadership skills. Through my academic journey, I have completed multiple real-world business projects, applying concepts in marketing, operations, and digital transformation. I aim to contribute to organizations by combining analytical thinking with practical problem-solving.
